text: The Best of Vanessa Amorosi is a greatest hits CD/DVD set released by Australian artist, Vanessa Amorosi in South Africa in 2005 and in Australia in 2006. == Track listing == {| class="wikitable" ! # !! width="300" | DISK 1 (CD) !! | Time |- | 01. || "Absolutely Everybody" || 3:42 |- | 02. || "Have a Look" || 3:35 |- | 03. || "I Wanna Be Your Everything" || 3:36 |- | 04. || "Shine" || 3:53 |- | 05. || "One Thing Leads 2 Another" || 3:16 |- | 06. || "Turning Up the Heat" || 3:09 |- | 07. || "Steam" || 3:47 |- | 08. || "Spin" || 3:02 |- | 09. || "The Power" || 3:34 |- | 10. || "Every Time I Close My Eyes" || 4:03 |- | 11. || "Follow Me" || 3:29 |- | 12. || "Bitter Twist" || 3:45 |- | 13. || "Change" || 3:22 |- | 14. || "Back in Love" || 3:44 |- | 15. || "True To Yourself" || 3:41 |} {| class="wikitable" ! # !! width="300" | DISK 2 (DVD) !! | Time |- | 01. || "Have a Look" (Australian video) || 4:00 |- | 02. || "Absolutely Everybody" (Millennium live version) || 3:50 |- | 03. || "Shine" (Australian video) || 3:50 |- | 04. || "Spin" || 3:05 |- | 05. || "Everytime I Close My Eyes" (German video) || 4:03 |- | 06. || "Turn to Me" (animated clip)|| 3:34 |- | 07. || "Absolutely Everybody" (UK club version) || 3:50 |- | 08. || "Have a Look" (German video) || 4:00 |} The Best of Vanessa Amorosi CD/DVD set (Cat#: SIMPCD011), released in the UK by Simply Music/Unique Corp. in 2006, contains "The Power" video clip on the DVD and the song "True to Yourself" is missing on the CD.discogs.com: The Best Of Vanessa Amorosi (UK) - Cat#: SIMPCD011 ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label !
